dcterms:creator: pmission
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 3625 images taken from the International Space Station during the night phase of the overflight, with attributes such as image ID, mission, and coordinates.
dcterms:title: Cities at Night Dataset

dcterms:creator: Sebastien C. Wong
Adam Gatt
Victor Stamatescu
Mark D. McDonnell
dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten digits used for classification tasks, known for its simplicity and effectiveness in evaluating machine learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Alejandro Sanchez de Miguel
dcterms:description: Specific subsets of the Cities at Night dataset focusing on images from Berlin, Paris, and Madrid, used to analyze light pollution and its sources.
dcterms:title: Cities at Night (specific subsets for Berlin, Paris, and Madrid)
